scripts.docker:dev: cp .env.development .env && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up --build
scripts.docker:up: cp .env.production .env && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml down && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up --build -d
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml down && docker build -f Dockerfile.prod -t anime-timeline-app . --no-cache && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d
